about_the_game: The Peugeot 205 T16 was purpose built for Group B rally, and cemented itself as one of the most successful cars in its group. The car was like many of its rivals, modified for use in rallycross, being a successful front runner in Europe. Modifications included a new aero kit, an extreme rear wing, and increased engine power output.
detailed_description: The Peugeot 205 T16 was purpose built for Group B rally, and cemented itself as one of the most successful cars in its group. The car was like many of its rivals, modified for use in rallycross, being a successful front runner in Europe. Modifications included a new aero kit, an extreme rear wing, and increased engine power output.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit versions of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD FX4300 or Intel Core i3 2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD7750 or NVIDIA GTX650Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
